channel.title: Need Help Runserver.bat
channel.description:
ok well im running my server off vps and i click runserver.bat and it pops up and closes this is what i have inside [code]@echo off color 0a title Bloody Vengeance java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
Some one help me please
